alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:05PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 645 PM MST... At 605 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sycamore Creek to Rio Verde to near Salt River Indian Community. Movement was west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Sycamore Creek, Sunflower, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, North Mountain Park, Downtown Peoria, Arrowhead Mall, Desert Mountain, Scottsdale Airport, Camp Creek, McDowell Mountain Park and Metro Center Mall. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 207 and 226. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 6 and 15. US Highway 60 between mile markers 149 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
